scripts.test: set -e; for t in test/*.js; do node $t; done
scripts.build: browserify index.js --igv , | indexhtmlify --appcache > index.html && node handler/cache.js > manifest.appcache
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages ; git checkout -b gh-pages && git push origin gh-pages; git checkout master
